@graph.name: Vegetarian Lettuce Wraps with Quinoa - Vegan Heaven
@graph.description: These vegetarian lettuce wraps with quinoa are the perfect meal for hot summer days. They're super light, extremely healthy, vegan, and pretty easy to make!

@graph.headline: Vegetarian Lettuce Wraps with Quinoa
@graph.keywords: healthy vegan lettuce wraps,healthy wraps recipe,quinoa lettuce wraps,Romaine lettuce wraps,vegan lettuce wraps,vegan lettuce wraps recipe,vegetarian lettuce wraps,vegetarian lettuce wraps recipe

@graph.name: Vegetarian Lettuce Wraps
@graph.description: These vegetarian lettuce wraps with quinoa, black beans, and corn make such an easy and healthy meal. One of my favorite vegan recipes for lunch and dinner! They're super healthy and packed with protein. So light and easy!
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup white bean spread or hummus ((hummus with roasted red pepper works really well))

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the quinoa according to the instructions on the package.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the quinoa according to the instructions on the package.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse and drain the black beans and the corn. In a medium-sized bowl, combine the black beans and the corn with the quinoa, lemon juice, paprika powder, cumin, and chopped parsley. Season with salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes.
recipeInstructions.name: Rinse and drain the black beans and the corn. In a medium-sized bowl, combine the black beans and the corn with the quinoa, lemon juice, paprika powder, cumin, and chopped parsley. Season with salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes.

recipeInstructions.text: Equally fill the quinoa mixture into the lettuce leaves and top them with some hummus, green onions, and if you want some sriracha. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Equally fill the quinoa mixture into the lettuce leaves and top them with some hummus, green onions, and if you want some sriracha. Enjoy!

@graph.keywords: recipe for vegetarian lettuce wraps, vegan lettuce wraps, vegetarian lettuce wraps
